reasoning: My roster has a significant weakness at RB behind Jahmyr Gibbs, while your team is incredibly deep at the position. Conversely, you could use a top-tier WR and a clear upgrade at TE. This trade addresses both our needs perfectly. You get a bonafide WR1 in Garrett Wilson and a top-10 TE in Jake Ferguson, while I get the elite RB2 I need in Jonathan Taylor. You can easily sustain the loss of Taylor with Kyren Williams and Travis Etienne Jr. still on your roster. It's a win-win that balances both teams.
